data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Savage Serpents Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Lay low in the grass until you are ready to strike with these three savage snake-themed weapon skins.

Features:
  • Grass Snake (weapon skin)
  • Desert Snake (weapon skin)
  • Dark Snake (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
